title: A1708 820 - 00840 intermittent battery issues / connection problem
message:
I've been sent in a 820 - 00840 that looks completely fine. 

No prior attempted repairs or water damage etc. 

Intermittent working from battery. 

Getting "no charging" message even though it's plugged into charger - sitting at 1%

Only pulling .200 - 600amp during boot and operation.

Sometimes it's fine, but most of the time it's not. 

Unsure what to do as everything is intermittent, any help is appreciated with this one

title: A1708 820 - 00840 intermittent battery issues / connection problem
message: Does it always start and works correctly with charger, without battery?
